column4: Hey, I currently have 2 computers in my room. Computer 1 is running windows xp and is connected to the internet, it has 2 ethernet cards. The second computer is running Ubuntu. there is a cable from it to computer 1. How do i get the ubuntu machine to use the internet, using the same ip and everything?
the cable between computers cannot be a normal cable, it needs some changes in the pairs order
and you will need some routing features installed
